content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 16}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft stripped_spruce_wood, I need to place 4 stripped_spruce_log in the crafting grid. There is already one stripped_spruce_log in slot 12, so I will move it to the crafting grid (starting from slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 16}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that there is one stripped_spruce_log in slot 1, I need to add another to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 16}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 45}]
thought: Next, I need to add another stripped_spruce_log to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 16}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 45}]
thought: Next, I need to add another stripped_spruce_log to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 16}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I can move the stripped_spruce_wood from the craft slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 3
